  • Method Details

    • setupBoundingBox

      protected abstract void setupBoundingBox()
      Sets up the bounding box around the shape. This method should be called after initialization of the Shape object or after any positional or rotational changes.

    • getStartingPoint

      protected abstract Point getStartingPoint()
      Gets the starting point for drawing the object
      Returns:
      Point with X,Y coordinate

    • drawShape

      public abstract void drawShape(Graphics g)
      Draw the shape using the provided graphics context. Each class inheriting must implement the drawShape method.
      Parameters:
      g - is the graphics context.

    • drawShape

      public void drawShape(Graphics g, Boolean isDisplayName, Boolean isDisplayBoundingBox)
      Draw the shape using the provided graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - is the graphics context.
      isDisplayName - indicates whether the shape's name should display.
      isDisplayBoundingBox - indicates whether the shape's bounding box should display.

    • drawDisplayName

      protected void drawDisplayName(Graphics g)
      Draw the shape's name using the provided graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - is the graphics context.

    • drawBoundingBox

      protected void drawBoundingBox(Graphics g)
      Draw the shape's bounding box outline using the provided graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - is the graphics context.

    • getShapeName

      protected String getShapeName()
      Returns the simple name of the underlying class as given in the source code.
      Returns:
      the shape name.

    • getCenterPoint

      protected Point getCenterPoint()
      Gets the center point coordinate of the shape (X,Y).
      Returns:
      the center point coordinate (X,Y).

    • isContainingPoint

      public Boolean isContainingPoint(Point point)
      Determine if Point p's co-ordinates fall inside the Shape's BoundingBox.
      Parameters:
      point - X,Y coordinate to check.
      Returns:
      Boolean to indicate if 'point' is inside bounding box.

    • toggleFilled

      public void toggleFilled()
      Toggles the Boolean isFilled variable between true and false.
